Conference.title: A/V: Conference Mode
Conference.errorNoAVModes: Could not find AV_MODES (AVSettings). Foundry may be incompatible.
Conference.errorNoAVModesChange: Could not find AV_MODES (AVSettings). Cannot change mode.
